article.content: Revision of texts in Portuguese language, in technical genre, into computation area - Internet for bugzilla - AMO ( addons.mozilla.org ) site https://addons.mozilla.org/pt-BR/firefox. , an inicial version pt-BR that looks for evaluation and user feedbacks. The refering articles of this work are placed into https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=380221. Feedback and comments are always wellcome - all text only will be completed with the help of the reader.
